item.title: AI can now pass the hardest level of the CFA exam in a matter of minutes
item.description: Previous research had found AI could clear Levels I and II of the CFA exam, but it struggled with Level III, due to the essay questions.

item.title: Powell says slowing labor market prompted rate cut, sees 'challenging situation' ahead
item.description: Powell said Tuesday that weakness in the labor market is outweighing concerns about stubborn inflation.
